channel.title: 3 pk points a kill
channel.description:
When people kill people, the "player name" has defeated "player name" appears three times.
I have searched client.java and only found one copy of that snipplet so I know something is calling on it three times. What I'm thinking is that it's set to appear on death stage two and that I have overlapping zones calling on death stage 2 so instead of firing once, you die three times per kill.
I just wanna know if this makes sense or if you think it is cause by something else?

item.title: 3 pk points a kill
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

When people kill people, the “player name” has defeated “player name” appears three times.

I have searched client.java and only found one copy of that snipplet so I know something is calling on it three times. What I’m thinking is that it’s set to appear on death stage two and that I have overlapping zones calling on death stage 2 so instead of firing once, you die three times per kill.

I just wanna know if this makes sense or if you think it is cause by something else?
